title: Update: Suspect arrested over Atulugama girl's death confesses to murder
body_lines: A 29-year-old man who was taken into custody over the death of the 9-year old girl from Atulugama has reportedly confessed to committing the murder.
Police said several statements were recorded into the death of the girl and the CID was conducting further investigations.
Meanwhile, the post mortem investigations into the girl's death was conducted today at the Panadura Hospital.
The victim went missing on Friday and her body was recovered on Saturday in a marshy land near her house in Atulugama. The suspect will be produced beofre court later today.(DSB)
